TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XlApplicationInternational extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定国家/地区和国际设置。

span.span: Specifies country/region and international settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xl24HourClock = int32(33)

summary.span: 如果使用 24 小时制时间，则返回 True；如果使用 12 小时制时间，则返回 False。

span.span: True if you’re using 24-hour time; False if you’re using 12-hour time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xl4DigitYears = int32(43)

summary.span: 如果使用四位年，则返回 True；如果使用两位年，则返回 False。

span.span: True if you’re using four-digit years; False if you’re using two-digit years.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlAlternateArraySeparator = int32(16)

summary.span: 如果当前数组分隔符与小数分隔符相同时替代的数组项分隔符。

span.span: Alternate array item separator to be used if the current array separator is the same as the decimal separator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlColumnSeparator = int32(14)

summary.span: 数组文字类型的列分隔符。

span.span: Character used to separate columns in array literals.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCountryCode = int32(1)

summary.span: Microsoft Excel 的国家/地区版本。

span.span: Country/Region version of Microsoft Excel.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCountrySetting = int32(2)

summary.span: Windows“控制面板”中的当前国家/地区设置。

span.span: Current country/region setting in the Windows Control Panel.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCurrencyBefore = int32(37)

summary.span: 如果货币符号在货币值之前，则返回 True；如果货币符号在货币值之后，则返回 False。

span.span: True if the currency symbol precedes the currency values; False if it follows them.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCurrencyCode = int32(25)

summary.span: 货币符号。

span.span: Currency symbol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCurrencyDigits = int32(27)

summary.span: 货币格式中的小数位数。

span.span: Number of decimal digits to be used in currency formats.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCurrencyLeadingZeros = int32(40)

summary.span: 如果显示零货币值的前导零，则返回 True。

span.span: True if leading zeros are displayed for zero currency values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCurrencyMinusSign = int32(38)

summary.span: 如果对负数使用负号，则返回 True；如果使用括号，则返回 False。

span.span: True if you’re using a minus sign for negative numbers; False if you’re using parentheses.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCurrencyNegative = int32(28)

summary.span: 货币格式负货币值： 0 = (symbolx) 或 (xsymbol) 1 =-symbolx 或-xsymbol2 = 符号 x symbol3 = symbolx 或 xsymbol 位置符号是国家或地区的货币符号。

span.span: Currency format for negative currency values:0 = (symbolx) or (xsymbol)1 = -symbolx or -xsymbol2 = symbol-x or x-symbol3 = symbolx- or xsymbol-where symbol is the currency symbol of the country or region.

summary.span: 请注意的货币符号的位置由xlCurrencyBefore。

span.span: Note that the position of the currency symbol is determined by xlCurrencyBefore.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCurrencySpaceBefore = int32(36)

summary.span: 如果在货币符号前面添加空格，则返回 True。

span.span: True if a space is added before the currency symbol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlCurrencyTrailingZeros = int32(39)

summary.span: 如果显示零货币值的尾部零，则返回 True。

span.span: True if trailing zeros are displayed for zero currency values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlDateOrder = int32(32)

summary.span: 日期元素的次序：0 = 月-日-年 1 = 日-月-年 2 = 年-月-日

span.span: Order of date elements:0 = month-day-year1 = day-month-year2 = year-month-day

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlDateSeparator = int32(17)

summary.span: 日期分隔符 (/)。

span.span: Date separator (/).

summary.span: 日符号 (d)。

span.span: Day symbol (d).

summary.span: 如果在日期中显示前导零，则返回 True。

span.span: True if a leading zero is displayed in days.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlDecimalSeparator = int32(3)

summary.span: 小数分隔符。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlHourCode = int32(22)

summary.span: 小时符号 (h)。

summary.span: 在字面数组中左大括号 ({) 的替代字符。

summary.span: 小写列字母。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlLowerCaseRowLetter = int32(8)

summary.span: 小写行字母。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlMDY = int32(44)

summary.span: 如果长日期显示中日期次序为月-日-年，则返回 True；如果次序为日-月-年，则返回 False。

span.span: True if the date order is month-day-year for dates displayed in the long form; False if the date order is day-month-year.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlMetric = int32(35)

summary.span: 如果使用米制度量系统，则返回 True；如果使用英制度量系统，则返回 False。

span.span: True if you’re using the metric system; False if you’re using the English measurement system.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlMinuteCode = int32(23)

summary.span: 分钟符号 (m)。

span.span: Minute symbol (m).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlMonthCode = int32(20)

summary.span: 月符号 (m)。

span.span: Month symbol (m).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlMonthLeadingZero = int32(41)

summary.span: 如果以数字显示月份时显示月份中的前导零，则返回 True。

span.span: True if a leading zero is displayed in months (when months are displayed as numbers).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlMonthNameChars = int32(30)

summary.span: 为了向后兼容总是返回三个字符。月份名称的缩写从 Microsoft Windows 中读取并且可以为任意长度。

span.span: Always returns three characters for backward compatibility. Abbreviated month names are read from Microsoft Windows and can be any length.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlNoncurrencyDigits = int32(29)

summary.span: 如果不以英文显示函数，则返回 True。

span.span: True if you’re not displaying functions in English.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlRightBrace = int32(13)

summary.span: 在字面数组中右大括号 (}) 的替代字符。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlApplicationInternational xlWeekdayNameChars = int32(31)

summary.span: 为了向后兼容总是返回三个字符。星期名称的缩写从 Microsoft Windows 中读取并且可以为任意长度。

span.span: Always returns three characters for backward compatibility. Abbreviated weekday names are read from Microsoft Windows and can be any length.
